Articles.Content:
It's fairly frustrating when trying to tweak sensitivities and dead zones to leave a game and go back to the main screen, make a change, play game, leave game, main menu, tweak settings, save, load game, test settings, leave game, tweak settings etc etc.

Can we please have an input edit button on the "Escape" Menu?
And change the audio setttings in the editor. This isn't impossible as mods Mike MusicMute and QuickMute exist during all scenes.
Or even better, have the escape key work in the editor.
